name: "Supergirl" Season 2 Episode 20 Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which hero was the woman in the opening scene afraid of?
questions.explanation:
Guardian.

	Guardian (James Olsen) swooped in to stop her from being attacked by several masked men. After he beat up the attackers, she was still laying on the ground and screamed at him to stay away as well. James then told Winn over the radio that they were calling it a night.

questions.text: Kara and Lena were discussing a reunion of which band while they had lunch?
questions.explanation:
'Nsync.

	They both agreed that JT (Justin Timberlake) was the only one holding up the reunion. Lena then asked Kara if she'd rather see that reunion or JT and Britney Spears get back together. Kara said it was an impossible question to answer.

questions.text: What planet was the alien who attacked National City from?
questions.explanation:
Phorian.

	The Phorians are a race of telekinetic beings who, before attacking National City, were generally peaceful. J'ohnn told the group that he had never seen one use their powers for violence before. He also said he was unaware of any being on Earth.

questions.text: What did Guardian find in the villains apartment?
questions.explanation:
Her son.

	Guardian found a young boy named Marcus. The boy appears human on the outside, and about the size of a child between 5 and 8 years old. Eventually James takes the boy with him to work, claiming he was his nephew. The boy took a liking to James and eventually opened up to him.

questions.text: Who did Lena suggest could fix her experiment?
questions.explanation:
Lex Luthor.

	Lena suggested, in jest, that they should go to Riker's Island and bust her adoptive brother out of jail. She told Rhea that Lex was the genius who was supposed to save the world and she wasn't as smart as he was. Rhea then countered that Lena was smarter, she just didn't realize it.

questions.text: Marcus and James fathers both had the same job. What was it?
questions.explanation:
Soldier.

	While exploring James' office Marcus picked up a camera that James' father had given him just before he died. James told Marcus a story about his father being a soldier and for the first time Marcus spoke, saying his father was also a soldier.

questions.text: Which member of Kara's team first realized that Rhea was still on Earth?
questions.explanation:
Mon-El.

	Mon-El thought he saw his mother, and eventually realized that he was right. At first he asked Winn to scan for his parent's ship, and confirmed that it had left the Earth's orbit. By the end of the episode he realized that they had been tricked and she was working with Lena.

questions.text: Lena never got her machine to work, eventually giving up.
questions.explanation:
False.

	By the end of the episode Lena's machine was working. Rhea used the machine to kidnap Lena, transport to her ship and eventually start an invasion of Earth.

questions.text: What aliens invaded Earth near the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Daxams.

	Several members of Mon-El's people came through the portal that Rhea and Lena built. As they came through Rhea announced, "Welcome to new Daxam" and the invasion began. The episode ended without a resolution to that invasion.

True.

	She answered Lena's phone on an incoming call from Kara with the phrase "Hello Supergirl". Rhea, also being an alien of similar physiology to Kara had known her identity since they first met several episodes earlier. She fought over the phone with Kara and then deleted the call log so Lena wouldn't know the call had come in.
